attributes.action: MPs should receive the average income.
attributes.additional_details:
Unemployment is rising, ordinary people are struggling with the cost of living crisis and millions of young people are hopeless about their future.

Despite all this, Members of Parliament earn a ridiculous amount of £65,000!

Where is the justice, where is the fairness, where is the democracy in our society?

Members of Parliament should receive the average annual income of £26,500, so hurry up and sign this petition.
